hooks.after:bump: tsx tools/sync-versions.ts ${version} && pnpm build:notice && git add NOTICE.md
hooks.before:release: pnpm build && pnpm --filter=docs build && pnpm --filter=@databricks/appkit dist && pnpm --filter=@databricks/appkit-ui dist
hooks.after:release: npm publish packages/appkit/tmp --access public --provenance && npm publish packages/appkit-ui/tmp --access public --provenance
